channel.title: LOOKING FOR A REALLY REALLY GOOD CODER! WILL be admin on my server
channel.description:
[b]DONT BOTHER EVEN POSTING[/b] [u]IF YOU DONT KNOW YOUR STUFF[/u]. [b]YOU WONT BE ADMIN IF YOU CANT FLUENTLY UNDERSTAND CODING. ONLY APPLY IF YOU KNOW YOU CAN DO WHAT I NEED YOU TO DO- AND THEN I WILL BE MORE THEN HAPPY TO MAKE YOU ADMIN. THANKYOU[/b]
I've already made some mods for finding glitches. Now i'm looking to make an admin for coding some stuff. I'm new and am a beginner. if you be a coder you'll be an admin on my server for doing a good job and accomplishing something. I dont want you to DO everything for me, but we'll team up :P
reasons you want to be admin on my server... LAG FREE! as far as i know. All feedback so far has said they've had no lag- also feeback is saying THEY LOVE MY SERVER so far, although theres a million things that could make it better. I feel it has much potential. Heres what i have planned....
1) ::rules command and u cant move until you read them 2) ::commands command 3) ::cwars tele command 4) ::pocketportal command wont work for some reason (its a guide that adds 5 more tele's then normal. 5) agility added but ::gnomecourse ::barbariancourse ect wont work although they're added. no error either 6) I wana add a minigame where you kill a dragon with like 1000 hp and it drops key you then go use on a chest located somewhere near mage bank in wildy and recieve 200 mill reward and a p hat. You must beat a hard foe...then risk dieing to recieve your reward.. 7) I wana add chompy bird hunting possibly but good rewards instead of hats... 8) I wana have it where ::noclip and ::cat and ::pickup and ::getitem and ::setobject and ::setnpc will all kick you from server. 9) I want to add castlewars. I think it might be already... if only i could GO TO CASTLE WARS and find out lol no tele command. 10)I want it so you can only summon 3 npc's 11)I want many shops changed and bonuses differed.
Dont worry you wont do all this i'll be helping (and doing most myself) these are just future updates...
Use the following form for an application....
[b]Are you currently coding any other servers? How much time do you spend a day on computer? How much experiance do you have with coding and java? Can you please post a few tuts or links that can assure me that your good with coding? Are you able to do almost all of the above future updates I want? Are you reliable/nice/respectful/intellegent[/b]
its hamachi atm...but dont turn away because of it. I'm going to buy a router soon[br][size=1]Posted on: May 23, 2007, 06:31:13 PM[/size][hr]Nobody wants to take up my offer?

item.title: LOOKING FOR A REALLY REALLY GOOD CODER! WILL be admin on my server
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

dragster32:

its hamachi atm…but dont turn away because of it. I’m going to buy a router soon

what does hamachi have anything to do with a router rofl…

edit:

okay i wont be a jerk but just go to http://no-ip.org put your IP and you don’t have to use hamachi if your IP changes just go to no-ip.org (if you have cookies enabled on your browser) it will automaticlly login and update your ip so you don’t have to do anything…

Read full topic

item.title: LOOKING FOR A REALLY REALLY GOOD CODER! WILL be admin on my server
item.dc:creator: @dragster32 dragster32
item.description:
@dragster32 wrote:

DONT BOTHER EVEN POSTING IF YOU DONT KNOW YOUR STUFF. YOU WONT BE ADMIN IF YOU CANT FLUENTLY UNDERSTAND CODING. ONLY APPLY IF YOU KNOW YOU CAN DO WHAT I NEED YOU TO DO- AND THEN I WILL BE MORE THEN HAPPY TO MAKE YOU ADMIN. THANKYOU

I’ve already made some mods for finding glitches. Now i’m looking to make an admin for coding some stuff. I’m new and am a beginner. if you be a coder you’ll be an admin on my server for doing a good job and accomplishing something. I dont want you to DO everything for me, but we’ll team up

reasons you want to be admin on my server… LAG FREE! as far as i know. All feedback so far has said they’ve had no lag- also feeback is saying THEY LOVE MY SERVER so far, although theres a million things that could make it better. I feel it has much potential. Heres what i have planned…

  1. ::rules command and u cant move until you read them
  2. ::commands command
  3. ::cwars tele command
  4. ::pocketportal command wont work for some reason (its a guide that adds 5 more tele’s then normal.
  5. agility added but ::gnomecourse ::barbariancourse ect wont work although they’re added. no error either
  6. I wana add a minigame where you kill a dragon with like 1000 hp and it drops key you then go use on a chest located somewhere near mage bank in wildy and recieve 200 mill reward and a p hat. You must beat a hard foe…then risk dieing to recieve your reward…
  7. I wana add chompy bird hunting possibly but good rewards instead of hats…
  8. I wana have it where ::noclip and ::cat and ::pickup and ::getitem and ::setobject and ::setnpc will all kick you from server.
  9. I want to add castlewars. I think it might be already… if only i could GO TO CASTLE WARS and find out lol no tele command.
    10)I want it so you can only summon 3 npc’s
    11)I want many shops changed and bonuses differed.

Dont worry you wont do all this i’ll be helping (and doing most myself) these are just future updates…

Use the following form for an application…

Are you currently coding any other servers?
How much time do you spend a day on computer?
How much experiance do you have with coding and java?
Can you please post a few tuts or links that can assure me that your good with coding?
Are you able to do almost all of the above future updates I want?
Are you reliable/nice/respectful/intellegent

its hamachi atm…but dont turn away because of it. I’m going to buy a router soon[br][size=1]Posted on: May 23, 2007, 06:31:13 PM[/size][hr]Nobody wants to take up my offer?
